title: Why Devs Go to the Epic Games Store - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.01.19
description:
Go to http://thirdlove.com/games now to find your perfect-fitting bra and get 15% off your first purchase!

Hurry to http://Upstart.com/KFGAMES to find out HOW LOW your Upstart rate is.

Andrea and Greg talk about Ooblets and MechWarrior's responses to going exclusive with Epic.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:20 - It’s Andrea’s Birthday!!
00:00:48 - “What are some of your favorite birthday memories?” - Javier Bonet-Ruiz
00:02:52 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack and Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:04:32 - Why are devs going to Epic Games Store?
00:20:14 - GTA Online Casino Update brings most players in since launch
00:21:23 - FTC Loot Box Summit Agenda
00:25:12 - “I had a question about the ESRB and rating of GTAV” - MaDogNik96
00:30:22 - TIDBITS!
00:38:07 - Out today
00:44:04 -  Thirdlove
00:45:21 - Upstart
Reader mail   -
00:46:33 - “I wanted to weigh in on the discussion about FPS games like CoD, Battlefield and Medal of Honor depicting war and combat…” - Jay from Melissa, TX
00:50:34 - “This is a follow-up to the question yesterday about whether we're heading to a subscription-only gaming future…” - Katie
00:52:53 - “Do you think you suffer from gaming addiction?” - EJ
00:58:22 - “In Yesterday's swell of news, one important event was forgotten...” - The Nano Biologist
01:03:32 - Squad Up: TheFarmerJosh - Discord - TheFarmerJosh
01:04:45 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Tim
